name: Veggie Fight!
description:
Hello!

Thank you for trying out my little game here! I hope you like it!

On her way home from adventuring, Ahbee was attacked by two enemies!

When it's Ahbee's turn, she can do one of two actions:
-Click the attack button to enter attack mode
-Choose what type of attack you want to use
-Then select what enemy you want to attack by hovering over them and clicking on them when they become green
-Click the potion button to restore some health when needed

Cheats and Strategy:
-The radish does more damage then the potato, so make sure you take him out first
-The fireballs do more damage to Radish Man, but the axe does more damage to the Potato Lad
-If you hear a different sound than usual when Ahbee lands an attack, that means you got a critical hit!
-Press "R" to restart the game

Borrowed Asset:

Battle Music- "Come On!" Mario & Luigi: Superstar Saga (GBA), Yoko Shimomura
Mario & Luigi: Superstar Saga (2003) AlphaDream, Nintendo

Victory Music- "Final Fantasy 7 Victory Fanfare (Super Smash Bros. for WiiU and 3DS Remix)" Super Smash Bros. for WiiU and 3DS, Hiroyuki Kawada
Super Smash Bros. for WiiU and 3DS (2014) Vers. 1.1.3 - 1.1.7 (2015) Bandai Namco Studios, Sora Ltd., Nintendo

Dash, Axe, and Potion Sound Effects- "Start, Cut, and HP Restore" Pokemon Red/Blue, Junichi Masuda
Pokemon Red/Blue (1996), Game Freak, Nintendo

Fireball Sound Effect- "Fireball" Super Mario Bros., Koji Kondo
Super Mario Bros (1985), Nintendo

Teleport and Critical Hit Sound Effects- Dragon Ball Z (1989-1996), Toei Animation

Potato Attack and Fire Damage Sound Effects- Slap and Fire Sounds, Freesound
“Sound Search.” Freesound, https://freesound.org/search/?q=slap.

Explosion Animation- Gifer.com, https://gifer.com/en/gifs/explosion.

All other assets created by Adam Frank
